articles.description: It looks like Russell Westbrook isn’t going to have any trouble fitting in with the Washington Wizards. According to Wizards head coach Scott Brooks, Westbrook interrupted him at practice on Saturday and told him that he was running a lot of the same sets he …
articles.content:
